name: pnp-search-parent-flows
title: CLI - Parent flows report
shortDescription: This script creates a report of all parent flows that invoke a defined child flow.
longDescription: This script creates a report of all parent flows accessible by the current user that invoke a defined child flow using the 'Run a Child Flow' action.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
